@graph.name: The Simple SEO Description Reword Prompt
@graph.description: This AI prompt for simple SEO description for you Shopify products provides an eye catching description, and is super easy to implement. You can use this prompt to match your store, on 1 or 1000’s of products all at once. Also see our prompt for the simple SEO title reword. The Prompt Where To Use […]

step.name: Navigate to product tab
step.text: Navigate to the 'product' tab in Optizen AI. Search via name or using tags for the product or products you wish to update. Use the check boxes to select the products.

step.name: Select reword prompt
step.text: Select the 'Reword SEO Description' from the drop down under the SEO title prompt field. Ensure you are using the prompt repository tab. Be sure to check the box for 'Update this section'. Then click Proceed.

step.name: Review and finalize
step.text: On completion of the prompt, check the output using the Log section of the app. You can then choose to keep or restore the update.

mainEntity.name: Where to use this AI prompt?

acceptedAnswer.text: This prompt is specific to the SEO description of Shopify products. You can use the prompt in its raw form from the repository, or edit and add to it for your specific use case.

This prompt can be used for any product in your Shopify store using the Optizen AI app if you want a simple way to create a standard but relevant SEO description for products and distinguish the SEO description from other stores who may be using the same products or same vendor catalogs.
